items.title: Will Serena Williams's weight-loss admission help shed stigma of anti-obesity drugs?
items.description: Could her comments instil a new sense of confidence in those using the drugs and quieten the critics?

items.title: Russia is trying to stop meeting on peace and prolong war, Zelensky says
items.description: Volodymyr Zelensky urges Western allies to impose fresh sanctions on Moscow if it shows no interest in peace.

items.title: Canada to drop some of its retaliatory tariffs on the US
items.description: The move comes after the two countries blew past a self-imposed deadline to reach a trade agreement.

items.title: How Israel's policies created famine in Gaza
items.description: Israel has systematically obstructed food entering Gaza, aid agencies say, as a UN-backed body confirms a famine.

items.title: Sri Lanka's former president Ranil Wickremesinghe arrested
items.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe has been arrested in connection with the alleged misuse of funds, officials said.
